Child content

Bootstrap: Button Group
Buttons
Renders Twitter Bootstrap button elements added as child content elements in a botton grouping wrapper which closely aligns the buttons/links.
Bootstrap: Button Link
Default Twitter Bootstrap button-styled link to a page, file or custom URL.

Bootstrap: Element Carousel
Content elements, images or simple texts (each type supporting captions) in a carousel matrix with JS based slide change.
DOM element ID (override not necessary but possible)
Optional CSS rule for the slider area body
Interval between image changes, in miliseconds (default: 5000)
Label: next (empty will display default arrow)
Label: previous (empty will display default arrow)
Optional CSS rule for the navigation dots
Display circle icons for direct selection of slides, default top right corner
Optional CSS rule for the quick slide selector dots
Optional CSS rule for the quick slide selector dots container
Image width, supports TS IMAGE widths, fx 250c to set width 250 with cropping

Bootstrap: Thumbnail Grid
Responsive grid of highly configurable thumbnails configurable with lightbox-style opening of content
Ratio of images, for example 0.75 (very grid friendly), 16/9 (widescreen) or 1.32 (nice golden ratio portrait)
Maxium allowed width to distribute across 12 cells. The Twitter Bootstrap default is 960
